title: DC League of Super-Pets: The Adventures of Krypto & Ace
description: Suit up as super-dogs Krypto and Ace and soar through the 3D streets of Metropolis, in a bot-smashing, pet rescuing adventure inspired by the movie! When Superman and Batman’s favorite caped canines uncover a plot to pet-nap Metropolis’s strays, these four-legged fighters aren’t just going to roll over. So, unleash Krypto’s Heat Vision and Arctic Bark powers, or Ace’s Batarangs and Shoulder Charge attacks, to bring evil bots to heel. Rescue the animals before they’re locked up, and pamper them at the Pet Adoption Center to earn super rewards. Then, prepare for the ultimate battle – who is behind the pet-napping plot?
